Spring Social VKontakte 1.0.0.BUILD-SNAPSHOT (June 7, 2011)
=======================================================
 - Implemented support for UsersOperations, WallOperations, FriendsOperations, SecureOperations, LocationOperations
   AudioOperations, GroupsOperations, NewsFeedOperations, UtilsOperations.

Spring Social VKontakte 2.0.0.BUILD-SNAPSHOT (January, 2016)
=======================================================
 - Removed previous API client implementation
 - Migrated to VK Java SDK, https://vk.com/dev/Java_SDK
